tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have visited Shilpi Reddy mam after watching her videos over internet . Even though it’s quite far from home (Habsiguda)  because of the treatment we decided to go for delivery at KIMS KONDAPUR. She is  always step ahead of identifying the issues / complications and helped us in throught the pregnancy period. Over all The service is amazing, the people are sweet and personable and I'm taken care of every time. Going to the GYN doesn't have to be such a daunting experience anymore, We feel confident putting my worries in Shipi Reddy Mam hands!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My pregnancy journey with Dr.Shilpi was very satisfactory. She never let me go down though i had complications in my pregnancy. I would strongly recommend this doctor for all pregnant women. She is very friendly and answered all my doubts and questions patiently. She was always available on phone at any time. I used to come from uppal to kondapur for her consultation. Though i was very nervous to travel but her continous support made my journey easy. She predicts the problem ahead and gives medication accordingly. She handles high risk pregnancy patients more efficiently. She always prefers normal delivery and encourages prenatal exercises. I delivered safely and healthy baby in her hands. I thank you very much mam from babitha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * *** ****** ***** ** ** *** *** ********* ********* * *** * **** *** ********** **** **** I went for checkup when I was 6 weeks pregnant, she saw my previous reports and said there is no cardiac activity so go for check scan and come back to me with reports, I said I had scan two days before only, but she said that’s okay now go for scan again, so I went for scan and they didn’t even provided the scan reports, they just wrote in the file that there is no cardiac activity yet, then the doctor decided that I had a miscarriage, there is no doubt about it* * *** **** **** ** ********* ** **** I was trying to explain her that there is a change in baby’s size from last scan and I have irregular periods so counting from LMP might not be accurate, but she was not at all listening to me, she started arguing with me, then I said I will wait, then she said ok your wish but there is no use of waiting, I was depressed a lot, *** ***** ** ******* *** ****** **** **** *** ** ****** ** we waited patiently for a week and went for another scan at different hospital* *** ** **** ** *** ** ****** ** ********** ****** ** **** *** ***** ***** so guys please don’t go to her ** ****** *** ****** ***** ****** *** ***** *** *** ******** **** ****** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: * *** **** ***** ******* ***** *** *** ******* ** ***** *** ******** ***** ************** ** ********** ********* *** ******** ******** The assistant, who was constantly on the phone, attended to me first. When Dr. Shilpi finally saw me, she spent less than 10 minutes on my case. She gave dietary advice only without reviewing my previous reports. She has just believed what I said verbally without any ultrasound or any check ups. If you're looking for personal attention and thorough care during the pregnancy , I would not recommend her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr shilpi reddy haven't resolved my problem. First she have scared me that surgery is the only option but during the surgery she didn't do what she said. ***** ***** **** ****** ***** **** ** ** **** Its just loss of time and money along with mental trauma

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Unsatisfactory treatment and bad experience. She had performed laproscopic surgery and left the underlying problem for which I have approached her unresolved. When I consulted her again due to the same horrible pain and health condition which I had faced before surgery, she diverted the case saying that it is a physiotherapy related problem. It is such a mental trauma to know that despite of spending money and time, my pain and health problem is left unresolved.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was diagnosed with TSH levels 4.56 which is borderline subclinical hypothyroidism and dr.shilpi reddy prescribed 25 mcg thyronorm tablet ***** ** ****** * **** **** *** ** ********* *** I used it for a year. **** * ******* ** **************** ** **** ** **** ** ******** **** *** ******* * ****** *** *** ********* **** ******* ** *** **** *** now I'm having trouble quitting the tablet ** ** **** ** ********* ** ** ** **** *** ******** ********** ***** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ***** ** ******* **** ** ****** *** ***** ***** ** ****** ***** ******* ***** ** ** ******** **** *** ***** ***** *** ********* ** ********. She will not even spend 2min of time to listen your problems, her assistant doctors will check your reports and provide the medication, in the mean time she is busy with her personal calls and she leave the consultation room to talk in call, if her assistant provide service then why should we choose shilpi Reddy consultation by paying huge money at Kims kondapur instead you can visit normal women specialist in your location **** **** **** **** **** ***** *** *** **** **** **** **** ******* such a bad experience with this doctor, i don't recommend this person to anyone****** **** **** **** *** ****** **** ** ******** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: consulted on mfine Feb22. Typically any doc on mfine is dot on time, this madamji Shilpi Reddy made me wait. Ah ok , I can take that easy. Now on call, she hardly gave me 20 sec may be to tell what I face and instantly came up with diagnosis (what ever she think of), and before I could explain a lil more, madam has cut the call. When I had patiently waited for good time monitoring mfine for her to reply , now she can at least have courtesy of saying, Do u have any question or inform not to worry,. When they don't have at least 2 min of time to listen, why they have to take up the case.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: My wife is 6 months pregnant. We are undergone treatment from the 1st month onwords in Kims. Doctor is very rude *** *** ** **** ********** ** ***** ****** **** ******* ******* She will not accept tests with other clinics or diagnostic center . *** **** ***** ******** **** ******** *** ** ******* **** ********** ** ***** **** **** ******** ** *** ** **** ********** ** *********** ****** **** ***** ** **** ******** ** ****** ****** **** ******* *** ******* ********** ****** ** ********* Her behavior is unacceptable *** ** **** ********* *** ******** ********** *** ***** Please don't go to her and save your money and time and health.

review: she hasn't seen anything, she just checked my other doctor reports and given the suggestion. she didn't tell anything

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: There is a saying - “If the doctor is caring and friendly, it gives patient all hopes” - Frankly to say this doctor is opposite of being a doctor. I have never come across such a rude doctor. She has zero sympathy towards her patients and is loud and rude. Didn’t suggest anything properly. I would never recommend Shilpi Reddy to anyone especially a ‘would be mother’. ********* ** ****** **** ******** ** ************

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shilpi Reddy was very friendly in explaining about my case during pregnancy. Treated me very well. During my 8th month of pregnancy, AFI got decreased but with her support, I admitted in hospital and she gave AFI shots and I delivered baby boy in 36th week. I strongly recommend her for all check ups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: We visited Dr. Shilpi Reddy for the regular pregnancy check up & follow up. She is very attentive and answered all our queries with relevant information. After talking to Dr. Shilpi Reddy, we are so confident & comfortable about pregnancy & delivering our first baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
MADAM IS NOT TAKING WELL WITH US WE ARE UNHAPPY WE WENT TO ANOTHER HOSPITAL FOR TREATMENT SHE  IS NOT EXPLAINING ABOUT TREATMENT
UNSATISFIED WITH THE DOCTOR AND SHE IS ABUSING US WITHOUT ANY REASON SHE IS SHOWING HARSH BEHAVIOR ON US WE ARE FEARED TO TALK WITH HER IF WE TALK SHE IS NOT TELLING  ABOUT OUT DOUBTS

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Kondapur Kim's branch is very poor at hospitality. 
Their front desk team is very reluctant in answering queries about lab reports. Their online services for accessing reports are not all working.

The doctor is not paying attention in listening to patients medical history in the initial visit. She was not freindly. She was not following the basic courtesies  which every individual should have while talking to others irrespective of their profession in any mode of communication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I purely went to visit her by watching her Insta fam but She is not approachable and has less patience more over she made patients to wait for 2 hrs for completing her personal tasks.

My first visit and sadly  disappointment to experience reality

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The treatment with Dr.Shilpi is very satisfactory. The guidance given by her and the value tips to be taken by us and the sessions conducted by her was so helpful.
